sources.title: As the Fly Flies (1944)
sources.description: The plummy-voiced narrator of this late Columbia black and white cartoon interviews Professor Igor Puzzlewitz and quizzes him on his newest Rube-Goldbergesque invention to swat flies. Chaos ensues. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/as-the-fly-flies-1944/

metadata.Plot: Famed professor Igor Puzzlewitz demonstrates his Rube Goldberg-esque fly-catching invention, but has a terrible time swatting a housefly in his own laboratory.
